text: Ia kɨranoveghang mɨzazitaba iniam, egh bizir kam ia damutɨ ia atiatingan markɨ. Ia orakigh. God ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim tuisɨgh egh foghasa, a gavgafi, o puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn, Satan ia damutɨ me ian tongɨn tarazi kalabus darɨgham. Eghtɨ ia 10 plan dughiabar osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzaziba ateram. Eghtɨ ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavir Kraisɨn itimɨn suiragh gavgafigh, mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ, ia aremeghamin dughiam, eghtɨ kɨ ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim ivezir aghuarimɨn mɨn pura ia danɨngam.
